import { Image } from "../assets/index"; const WhyUs = () => { return (

Our Commitment to Social Impact

Driving Economic Growth and Reducing Inequality Through Employment

At GetGlobal, we are not just about business. We are committed to making a lasting social impact by providing meaningful employment to underserved communities. Through our training and job placement programs, we contribute to several UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), including:

Goal 1: No Poverty

By creating job opportunities for underprivileged demographics.

Goal 4: Quality Education

By offering world-class tech training to underserved communities.

Goal 8: Decent Work and Economic Growth

By fostering sustainable livelihoods through decent jobs.

through decent jobs. Goal 10: Reduced Inequality

By empowering underrepresented communities through employment.
); }; export default WhyUs;
